 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.soa.policy.wspolicy

Interface Summary
Assertion Base interface for all WS-Policy assertions.
AssertionMarshaller An interface for all classes that can marshal an Assertion to a DOM-based XML structure and unmarshal a DOM-based XML structure to an Assertion.
EffectivePolicyFactory IEffectivePolicyFactory implementation based on WS-Policy and WS-PolicyAttachment.
PolicyConstants Commonly used policy constants.
PolicyMarshaller PolicyMarshler marshals policy to DOM-based XML and unmarshals DOM-based XML to Policy.
SubPolicyAssertion A type of assertion that supports sub-policy, meaning that the assertion might or must have nested policy.
SubPolicyAssertionMarshaller This is a special type of AssertionMarshaller that requires a instance of PolicyMarshaller to be used to marshall the nested Assertion into sub Policy elements.
XmlAssertionWrapper  
 

Class Summary
AbstractAssertion A base class for Assertions, providing the initial implementation of the Assertion interface.
AbstractSubPolicyAssertion A base class for SubPolicyAssertions, providing the initial implementation of the SubPolicyAssertion interface.
All All is an implementation of the WS-Policy All policy operator.
ExactlyOne ExactlyOne is an implementation of the WS-Policy ExactlyOne policy operator.
JavaAssertion Assertion implementation that defers the assertion attribute modeling to a wrapped Java object.
JaxbAssertionMarshaller  
Policy Policy represents the WS-Policy policy operator, and provides additional functionality to apply to policy.
PolicyOperator Base class for WS-Policy policy operators.
PolicyReference PolicyReference represents a WS-Policy PolicyReference element.
PolicyVisibility Enumeration of policy visibility options.
ReferencedPolicyFactory Class for creating policy based on URI references.
ReflectionAssertionMarshaller Binds Java classes with no-arg constructors with empty element assertions.
XmlAssertion An assertion whose contents remain in a DOM-based format.
XmlAssertionMarshaller XmlAssertionMarshaller can marshal and unmarshal XmlAssertions.
